titleStmt.title: A letter to a member of Parliament, shewing, that a restraint on the press is inconsistent with the Protestant religion, and dangerous to the liberties of the nation
titleStmt.author: Tindal, Matthew, 1653?-1633.
Defoe, Daniel, 1661?-1731.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J. Darby, and sold by A. B[ell]. at the Cross-Keys and Bible in Cornhil,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Matthew Tindal by. S. Parks; see also "Four discourses on the following subjects ... IV. Of the liberty of the press. London, 1709"; attributed also to Daniel Defoe.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
